Key Match Events: Grant McCray hit a 3-run homer off Dylan Cease in the 2nd inning and a 2-run blast off Yuki Matsui in the 9th inning for the first multi-homer game of his big league career
Pre-Game Insights: The Padres are in a stretch where they'll play the Giants six times in eight games and not have to face former Friar Blake Snell one time
Post-Match Reflections: The loss makes things a little more interesting in the National League Wild Card chase
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets have won nine straight games to knock the Braves out of the final spot
Others: San Diego owns the 4th seed and has a 2.0 game lead on the Diamondbacks
